thread.section_title: Firebird Tours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firebird Tours | firebirdtours.com
thread.title: Caren Bolton
thread.title_full: Firebird Tours reviewed by Caren Bolton

author: Caren Bolton
title: Caren Bolton
text: We've enjoyed each and every aspect of our recent trip to Spain! Everything from pre-trip communication to our departure pick-up & transfer in Seville's airport worked like clockwork. All guides we had were very professional and engaging. Madrid hotel included in our tour also deserves a separate mention. Overall an excellent travel experience!
